```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

Simple leaflet map.  
```{r map, echo =TRUE}
library(leaflet)

lat<-state.center$y
long<-state.center$x
lab <-state.name
size<-unname(state.x77[,"Population"])
my_map <-leaflet()%>%
        addTiles()%>%
        addCircles(lng= long,lat = lat, radius= 10*size, label = lab)

my_map
```
